page.title: 09Recreation in Fauldhouse
page.content: A running club is held on Monday and Thursday . It costs 20p every Thursday.The running club is held in the{Miners' Welfare}.We get sprints', strides' and {cross country }, in the{running club}.You go{cross country and{Track}races in{Fauldhouse ,Hawick, {Kirkcaldy}and {Perth}.There used to be 25 at the{running club}but there are only 5 now as members from an {adjoining Village }left and formed their own club. South of the village is an 18 hole {golf course.}It is open every day of the week.It costs for an adult Â£110 pounds for the first years membership. It then costs Â£100 a year, Junior memberships are Â£16 a year. In the Village there is also a bowling club and two out door tennis courts.
